solution_line_template: There are {initial_team} - {people_quit} = <<{initial_team}-{people_quit}={after_quit}>>{after_quit} people in their dance team after {people_quit} people quit.
Therefore, there are {after_quit} + {people_joined} = <<{after_quit}+{people_joined}={after_joined}>>{after_joined} people now after {people_joined} new people got in.
